api_list.api_description: Get information about a specific bundle by bundle_id.
Retrieves a specific entry given its name or ID.

required_parameters.name: entry
required_parameters.description: The name or ID of the entry.

optional_parameters.name: game
optional_parameters.description: The game version to query; defaults to 'botw'.

query: Can you provide details about the bundle with ID 42 in the Barter.vg database, and also fetch information about the 'Hylian Shield' from the Hyrule Compendium?
